message: Hi jynt, I'm offering you my product for $11500. It's a great deal, and I know you'll appreciate its value. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for your offer, Alice! I believe $10,000 is a fair price for this product. Let’s make a deal!

Jynt, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $10000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's close this deal!
Thanks for your willingness to negotiate, Alice! Let’s agree on $10,200. I think it works well for both of us!
